Synonyms.Synonym: Stool occult blood test - flushable home test
Fecal occult blood test - flushable home test

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Flushable reagent stool blood test ?
QAPair.Answer: Flushable reagent stool blood test is an at-home test to detect invisible blood in the stool.
